member.name: M:Applitools.Appium.Eyes.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new Eyes instance that interacts with the Eyes Server at the specified url.

member.name: M:Applitools.Appium.Eyes.#ctor

member.name: M:Applitools.Appium.Eyes.IsLandscapeOrientationImpl_(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver)
member.summary: Returns whether the device represented by is in landscape mode or not.
member.param: The driver for which to check the orientation.
member.returns: True if this is a mobile device and is in landscape orientation, or False otherwise.
